result.html: Cén caitheamh aimsire atá agatWhat are your pastimes?
result.ponchtml: Cén caiṫeaṁ aimsire atá agatWhat are your pastimes?

result.eng: Tell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.
result.ga: Inis dom faoin gcaitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat ó cheann ceann na seachtaine
result.orig: Inis dom faoin gcaitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat ó cheann ceann na seachtaine
result.html: Inis dom faoin gcaitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat ó cheann ceann na seachtaineTell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.
result.ponchtml: Inis dom faoin gcaiṫeaṁ aimsire a ḃíonn agat ó ċeann ceann na seaċtaineTell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.

result.eng: What pastimes do you have in the winter?
result.ga: Cén caitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat sa ngeimhreadh
result.orig: Cén caitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat sa ngeimhreadh
result.html: Cén caitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat sa ngeimhreadhWhat pastimes do you have in the winter?
result.ponchtml: Cén caiṫeaṁ aimsire a ḃíonn agat sa ngeiṁreaḋWhat pastimes do you have in the winter?

result.eng: Now, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.
result.ga: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsire
result.orig: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsire

result.ponchtml: Anois ba ṁaiṫ liom cúpla ceist eile a ċur ort faoi ċaiṫeaṁ aimsireNow, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.
